definition: delicately beautiful, something considered choice to eat
details:
adjective
- delicately beautiful
= example: delicately beautiful
= synonyms: exquisite
- excessively fastidious and easily disgusted
= synonyms: nice
- affectedly dainty or refined
= synonyms: prim, mincing, niminy-piminy, twee
- especially pleasing to the taste
= example: especially pleasing to the taste
noun
- something considered choice to eat
= synonyms: delicacy, treat, goody, kickshaw
